name: surco
0:
”Alexa, turn on the TV”
”Alexa, turn on air conditioner”
”Alexa, turn off the Light”
skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
surco Action lets you control your home appliances remotely with a surco device. 

Currently supported devices and commands:
TV
SetTopBox
DVD
AUX
Light
Air conditioner
